title: Chocolate pumpkin bread
ingredients: ['500g caster sugar', '400g pumpkin puree (tinned or fresh)', '250ml vegetable oil', '150ml water', '4 eggs', '450g plain flour', '1 tablespoon ground cinnamon', '1 tablespoon ground nutmeg', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '200g chocolate chips (or chopped plain chocolate)', '75g chopped walnuts (optional)']
